title: Worship Without Comparison
description: Today, do not compare your worship or knowledge to anyone else’s. Focus inward only.

title: Hidden Deeds – 3 Days
description: Do one good deed each day in complete secrecy. Tell no one. Not even in hint.

title: 7 Days of Sincere Humility
description: For one week, focus on your flaws during worship. Reflect on how far you are from Allah.

title: Greet Everyone First
description: Greet people today regardless of status — from cleaner to executive — equally and sincerely.

title: Eat with the 'Lowly'
description: Sit or eat with someone you might subconsciously look down on. Do it with joy and love.

title: 14-Day Superiority Cleanse
description: Avoid all thoughts or speech that imply you're better than anyone — for two full weeks.

title: No Mirror Praise
description: Do not admire yourself in a mirror or selfie today. Say 'Allahumma kama hassanta khalqi…'

title: Dress Simply – 3 Days
description: Wear something modest and simple — not for others, but to purify your intent.

title: 7-Day Vanity Cleanse
description: Avoid all vanity-related actions or thoughts — beauty, clothes, or strength — for 7 days.

title: Accept One Correction
description: Today, if someone corrects you — even if harsh — take it gently. Say thank you.

title: Ask for Feedback – 3 Days
description: Ask someone you trust for sincere advice, and receive it silently. Reflect deeply.

title: 7-Day Openness to Correction
description: Each day, welcome advice. Keep a journal of what you hear without justifying yourself.

title: One Sincere Apology
description: Find someone you’ve wronged — however small — and apologise with sincerity.

title: 3 Days of Softness
description: If you're confronted, respond without ego. Apologise even when it stings.

title: 7-Day Pride Detox
description: For 7 days, actively look for moments to say: 'I was wrong' or 'I'm sorry.' Let your heart soften.

title: Do It in Secret
description: Today, do one good deed and actively hide it. No sharing. No reward but Allah.

title: No Praise Check – 3 Days
description: Don’t check social media or ask how people responded to your words or efforts.

title: 14-Day Fame Cleanse
description: For two weeks, detach from the need for recognition. Be silent and unseen, for Allah alone.

title: One Gesture of Equality
description: Today, sit, eat, or walk with someone whom others usually overlook.

title: 3-Day Language Watch
description: Avoid all belittling words — even in tone or implication — for 3 days.

title: 7-Day Respect Practice
description: Speak to everyone as if they were spiritually higher than you. Let it reshape your manner.
